page.title: 06Homelife-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: I get up at about 7.45 in the morning. I get dressed then have breakfast of corn_flakes or toast. School starts at 9 o'clock,and since I live next door,I don't have to rush. I go home at 12 o'clock for dinner, usually something like scrambled eggs or beans on toast. School ends at 3.30 .I wait for my friend to come home,from Clitheroe at 4.15,then I play with him.We sometimes go to play at our'dens',or,if it is raining,we play on the computer,or at{'Dungeons & {Dragons'},a fantasy role playing game. Once a week I go to{Scouts}in Grindleton where we do lots of different activities like badge-work or we go out and play Wide-games. Sometimes we go on outings and camps. I usually go to bed at about 9 o'clock.
